channel.title: Username problem
channel.description:
This a bit challenging prob nobody knows but, bascially when i put my username as lets say "fuck you" the username would be "you" when you login. This is server sided because when i used a different client, it had the name fuck you instead of you! IM PROB NOT GNNA GET ANY HELP.. my user [URL=http://imgur.com/kC6T8Iw][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kC6T8Iw.png[/img][/URL]
When logged in [URL=http://imgur.com/IZ1WTOg][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IZ1WTOg.png[/img][/URL]
